channel.title: Karpoke - Just another Pelican blog - LogJam

item.title: LogJam — This new encryption glitch puts Internet users at risk
item.description: After HeartBleed, POODLE and FREAK encryption flaws, a new encryption attack has been emerged over the Internet that allows attackers to read and modify the sensitive data passing through encrypted connections, potentially affecting hundreds of thousands of HTTPS-protected sites, mail servers, and other widely used Internet services. A team of …
item.dc:creator: Nacho Cano
